DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial investigate effect early intervention low birth weight infant discharge NICU neurodevelopmental outcome . Other control group VLBW infant , study population include term infant compare neurodevelopmental outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Early Family Based Intervention Preterm Infants
